1681320.name: The Will of Our Fathers
1681320.description:
The Will of Our Fathers is a top-down 2D action-exploration game with an old-school design philosophy. Explore a large, interconnected world full of traps and treasure, delve into challenging and mysterious dungeons, and uncover secret schemes against The Will of Our Fathers.

Game Features:

Top-Down Action:
Explore and fight monsters in a retro-inspired top-down pixel art style.

Free Exploration:
Explore where you want, when you want, without tutorials or an overly linear early game.

Ancient Treasure:
Find rings, potions, and other treasures to help you on your quest. In the great classic RPG tradition, you'll have to experiment to find out exactly what each item does.

Secrets of the Ruins:
Decipher ancient runes to discover the secrets of the ruins.
